thread.title: Nishikori beats Cilic to reach Japan Open semifinals
thread.title_full: Nishikori beats Cilic to reach Japan Open semifinals - San Francisco Chronicle

title: Nishikori beats Cilic to reach Japan Open semifinals
text: Photo: Eugene Hoshiko, AP Stan Wawrinka of Switzerland returns a shot against Austin Krajicek, of the United States, during their singles quarterfinal match at the Japan Open men’s tennis tournament in Tokyo, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. Stan Wawrinka of Switzerland returns a shot against Austin... TOKYO (AP) — Defending champion Kei Nishikori beat Marin Cilic 3-6, 7-5, 6-3 on Friday to advance to the semifinals of the Japan Open. Stan Wawrinka of Switzerland returns a shot against Austin Krajicek, of the United States, during their singles quarterfinal match at the Japan Open men’s tennis tournament in Tokyo, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. Stan Wawrinka of Switzerland returns a shot against Austin... TOKYO (AP) — Defending champion Kei Nishikori beat Marin Cilic 3-6, 7-5, 6-3 on Friday to advance to the semifinals of the Japan Open.
